import api from'./api';// Approval related API calls
const approvalService={// Send approval email
sendApprovalEmail:ticketId=>{return api.get(`/approval/send/${ticketId}`);},// Verify approval token
verifyApprovalToken:token=>{return api.get(`/approval/verify/${token}`);},// Process approval action
processApproval:function(token,action){let reason=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'';return api.post(`/approval/process/${token}/${action}`,{reason});}};export default approvalService;
